title: Chapter 177 - Please Return To Being An Earthling
body:
Chapter 177 - Please Return To Being An Earthling


“What exactly happened?!” Yao Si shoved the four death grips on her hand while resisting the urge to pull open her pants to clarify the situation. Judging from their reactions though, the person in front of her was probably telling the truth and her body had been swapped with Lin Long’s.


“How do I know?” She saw herself roll her eyes. “I have been like this ever since I woke up.”


“How can we change back our bodies?” Yao Si was starting to feel uneasy. She had never expected to turn into a man and definitely not Long Ergou.


Silence fell upon them; it was obviously the first time they had experienced such a situation.


“Sisi.” Mu Xuan frowned, and his voice was grave. “Tell me what exactly happened? Don’t skip on anything.”


“What could have happen? We were attacked by the force field in the last checkpoint, and Lin Long insisted on using his fire ability to forcefully break through the barrier. In the end, the force field swallowed and sent it back. Under that critical situation, I—” Yao Si stopped midway through her speech. Her eyes went wide when a sudden possibility struck her. “My ability!”


F*ck, could the situation be because of her absurd ability?


Back when she had activated it, Lin Long had been using a fire ability, so she had assumed that with her counter ability, a water ability would appear. However, she had forgotten that he had a full-series ability which meant that she was supposed to have no reaction at all.


Her current predicament… was it perhaps caused by her ability countering the force field and not because of Lin Long?


Since it had been a revolving portal, could the counter ability be… reincarnation?! Returning her back to her human state?!


F*ck! This is ridiculous!


(╯‵□′)╯︵┻━┻


Before she fainted, the fire dragon in front of her had turned into a ball of flame. At that time, Lin Long should have been the only one facing the fireball, which meant that their bodies had already swapped by then.


Everything… was really caused by her ability!


Mu Xuan seemed to have come to the same conclusion, and he turned to face Lin Long. “Do you have an ability now?”


“Why?” Lin Long took a cautious step back. “You still want to fight? Let me tell you, don’t assume I’m afraid of you!”


“Which means you don’t.” Mu Xuan ignored him, and turned toward the person at his side. “Sisi?”


Yao Si understood his question and took a moment to sense within herself. Even though her body was different, it was still empty without the hint of any ability. She shook her head.


Mu Xuan heaved a sigh of relief. Their abilities seemed to have swapped together with their consciousness, so Lin Long still had a full-series ability and Yao Si still had that absurd ability of hers.


Since their abilities hadn’t changed and they were in their current predicament because of her ability, if they were to return to the original location and activate it once more, there was a possibility they could return to normal.


“Bai Yi, where’s the last checkpoint you guys went to?”


Bai Yi tapped open the map and pointed toward the bottom left of the planet. “Your Majesty, this is the checkpoint.”


“Let’s go, we’re heading back to Ability Planet.” He grabbed onto Lin Long and headed out.


“Why are we going back?” Lin Long asked in confusion. “Hey, hey, hey! Put me down, I’m not going back to that ghostly place! What if something else happens? Hey Mu, put me down!”


Mu Xuan paid him no heed. Once he reached the door, he turned to call for Yao Si. “Sisi.”


She went after feeling a little odd when she witnessed Mu Xuan pulling ‘her’ out the door, but his intentions were clear. Even though her ability was absurd, it could always be summoned. There was a chance they could swap back if she were to activate it once more.


Since the last checkpoint couldn’t be entered through a space portal, they headed over in a ship. Fortunately, they were in a space station close to the Ability Planet and not far from the checkpoint.


Mu Xuan dragged the unwilling Lin Long with one hand while Yao Si followed after. His expression was solemn and frosty as he passed through the lengthy passageway toward the ship.


A common sight seemed almost paradoxical now that their bodies were swapped. All the employees were unconsciously attracted, causing a strange atmosphere to blanket over the space station as an endless stream of conversation could be heard.


“His Majesty looks fierce, what’s wrong? Did they argue?”


“Can’t you see him dragging her? Poor thing… Isn’t Her Highness still a young cub?”


“I heard she was injured during the coming of age test, so is His Majesty perhaps angry that she didn’t pass?”


“Doesn’t His Majesty know how to treasure his cub? It’s been so many years after all… Do you guys understand?”


“It’s possible! But whose cub didn’t fail a few times before passing? It’s Her Highness’ first failure.”


“Eh, didn’t you hear the rumor from the Elders Council? Back when His Majesty first woke up and heard that Her Highness was a fifth generation, he immediately acknowledged her as his cub. There seems to be… an inside story!”


“With his current temper, do you think His Majesty would…”


“100%… Poor Her Highness!”


“Her highness really is pitiful +1”


“…” Mu Xuan.


“…” Lin Long.


“…” Yao Si.


“F*ck! Why are these people looking at me like that?” Lin Long could feel his hair standing up from all the sympathetic gazes. He cursed, then rubbed the goose bumps forming on his arm before turning toward Mu Xuan. “What exactly did you do when you awakened?”


Mu Xuan’s face darkened. “Shut up!” He hastened toward the ship. He had finally learned where the rumor about how he had randomly grabbed a fifth generation cub from desperation originated. Those guys in the Elders Council needed to be taught a lesson!


“Ay, slow down!” Lin Long complained without end while being dragged by Mu Xuan. He then started cursing again. “F*ck! I have short legs right now, so why are you walking so fast? Don’t think I’m afraid of you! Let’s have a match if you dare, you @&^@&^…@&@^”


An endless string of vulgarities sprouted from his mouth continuously without a breather, leaving Yao Si speechless. She leaped forward and sealed his mouth shut.


Any more and you’ll ruin my reputation!


After enduring odd stares from the people in the space station, they finally reached the ship, but just as they were about to board it, the floor started to tremble. The space in front of them started to distort, and the ship that was originally in front of them disappeared. It looked as though something had eaten it up.


A gigantic ship that looked like a lotus suddenly appeared in the space station. It was snowy white and almost the size of the entire space station. Yet it seemed… oddly familiar?


Wasn’t it… the Flower of the Heavenly Tree?


(⊙_⊙)


Before Yao Si could react, the ground started to crack, inching open slowly. She lost her footing momentarily, and fell in with Mu Xuan and Lin Long who was beside her.


“Sisi!” Mu Xuan raised his hands, and the next second, a transparent bubble floated over, about to engulf her.


Suddenly, a familiar voice drenched in excitement rang out. “Sisi, I finally found you!” A massive figure appeared, and stunningly beautiful pair of butterfly-like wings spread open before them.


“Lian Yu!”


“Dearest, I won’t let anyone take you away this time.” The next second, light shone from the lotus. It bypassed Mu Xuan’s transparent bubble, speeding over at high speed.


With a loud splash… it engulfed Lin Long who was beside Yao Si and disappeared instantly!


“…” Yao Si.


“…” Mu Xuan.


“…” The stupefied crowd.


The next moment, both the Flower of the Heavenly Tree and Lian Yu were gone, leaving a half-ruined space station and a bunch of ridiculed bloodlings.


Lian Yu’s oath continued to ring without end.


“We have the true love… love… love… love!”


F*ck your love! Return me my body!


(╯‵□′)╯︵┻━┻
